name: F18 Strike Fighter Pilot . Jet Flight Simulator Game For Free
name_original: F18 Strike Fighter Pilot . Jet Flight Simulator Game For Free
description:
The army has hired you to complete a dangerous mission!

You have to choose a fighter plane and fly from a military airfield to a plane carrier!

F16, F22, Sukhoi, Shenyang and other 4th and 5th generation fighter jet planes are waiting at your command!

Sit into the cockpit and boost into the sky of aerial warfare!

Be aware, since there are lots of other strike fighters in the sky as well!

Also, some pilots around the world are competing against you in real time multiplayer!


Includes:

* Multiplayer! (Fly against your friends!)
* Leader boards! (Compare your score in gamecenter!)
* Beautiful 3D graphics!
* Explosions!
* Fast speeds!
* Intense action movie feeling!

You have to get there before the attack on the navy starts!
Will you save the navy from a complete defeat?!!

Follow us on Twitter: @bravocterogames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
